title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 263 - Rules Implementing the Farm Laborers' Fair Labor Practices Act ("FLFLPA")
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 263 - Rules Implementing the Farm Laborers' Fair Labor Practices Act ("FLFLPA")

State Regulations
DEFINITIONS AND GENERAL PROVISIONS (§ 263.1 to 263.17)
SPECIAL MEDIATORS (§ 263.18)
PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION (§ 263.19 to 263.24)
HEARINGS AND ELECTIONS (§ 263.25 to 263.28)
CERTIFICATIONS (§ 263.29 to 263.31)
UNIT CLARIFICATION (§ 263.32 to 263.33)
PROCEDURE UNDER SECTION 706 OF SERA FOR PREVENTION OF UNFAIR LABOR PRACTICES CHARGE (§ 263.34 to 263.39)
ANSWER (§ 263.40 to 263.45)
GENERAL PROVISIONS RELATING TO ALL PROCEEDINGS JOINDER (§ 263.46 to 263.47)
MOTIONS (§ 263.48 to 263.49)
WAIVER (§ 263.50)
INTERVENTION (§ 263.51)
CONSOLIDATION OR SEVERANCE (§ 263.52)
WITNESSES AND SUBPEONAS (§ 263.53 to 263.54)
CONFERENCES AND HEARINGS (§ 263.55 to 263.73)
DESIGNATION, POWERS AND DUTIES OF BOARD'S AGENTS (§ 263.74 to 263.75)
SERVICE OF PAPERS AND ORDERS OF THE BOARD (§ 263.76 to 263.78)
CERTIFICATION AND SIGNATURE OF DOCUMENTS (§ 263.79)
CONCILIATION (§ 263.80 to 263.97)
SETTLEMENT OF LABOR DISPUTES PURSUANT TO§702-a of SERA (§ 263.98)
IMPASSE RESOLUTION PROCEDURES FOR AGRICULTURAL EMPLOYERS AND FARM LABORERS (§ 263.99 to 263.106)
DECLARATORY RULINGS (§ 263.107 to 263.108)
ACCESS TO RECORDS OF THE BOARD (§ 263.109 to 263.112)
MISCONDUCT BEFORE THE AGENCY (§ 263.113 to 263.114)
PRIVACY PROTECTION AND ACCURACY OF PERSONAL DATA (§ 263.115 to 263.123)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 263

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

Statutory authority: Labor Law, art. 20; L. 2019, c. 105, as Adopted by L.2020, c. 58, pt. II, §
3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
